show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Sandy Relief
content: This week on Connect the Dots Alternet and Huffington journalist Alison Rose Levy will connect the dots with Hurricane... <!--more--> Sandy relief efforts with Jessica Roff– a former Federal Indian law practitioner, a climate justice/anti fracking and  food justice activist— serving as a full-time volunteer core Occupy Sandy organizer in the Rockaways since right after the storm.
